survey_image_info: File with .jpg or .png format & maximum size of 2MB (710x178px resolution recommended)
survey_empty_label: Explore template and find survey based on your need
tour_title_3: Choose a Template for Your Survey
tour_title_6: Set Who Can Access Your Survey
tour_body_1: Create a free survey and you can easily sell your survey here! Let's explore all the features now!
tour_body_2: Click here to make a survey according to your needs
tour_body_3: There are many survey templates that you can use in this menu
tour_body_4: Check all the surveys that you have made & have purchased in this menu
tour_body_5: In this menu you can buy templates with the balance of points you have
tour_body_6: You can manage & add anyone who accesses your survey in this menu
